channel.title: anaconda on sergem's personal public notebook
channel.description: Recent content in anaconda on sergem's personal public notebook

item.title: Conda cheat sheet
item.description: I usually prefer to keep (ana)conda deactivate in my system by default. One can chose such and option during conda installation. In order to activate base conda environment I run: source ~/anaconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh or source ~/miniconda3/etc/profile.d/conda.sh
